author: ts:ez.no
msg: # We talk everywhere of format, only this is a design relict.
- Added convenience method outputLine() to ezcConsoleOutput.
# I often missed that when using the class.

author: rb:ez.no
msg: - Removed return type for the constructor.
- Changed __construct to the same as the class name.
- All non-abstract functions have a body.
- @access overrides the access type from the reflection.
- Always the first multitype is chosen.
